content: this legal document from the court of naples in italy discusses a case involving two parties referred to as the actor and the convenientactor the case revolves around an untitled occupation of a property the court has scheduled a decision hearing date and both parties have their own lawyers representing them the document mentions the existence of court documents hearing minutes and written handling notes that will be taken into consideration the court has ruled in favor of the actor stating that the convenientactor is holding properties without proper title that are coowned by the actor specifically an apartment in naples was found to be coowned by the former spouses the court has ordered the convenientactor to release the property to the community of former coowners and compensate the actor for the loss of use and occupation the court has also awarded costs and fees to the actor the document provides background information on the marriage and property ownership as well as unsuccessful attempts at mediation the court carefully considered the evidence and witness testimonies before ruling in favor of the actor ordering the release of the property and compensation the court has also addressed the issue of extraordinary expenses and ordered the convenientactor to reimburse the actor for a portion of those expenses the counterclaims made by the convenientactor were dismissed lastly the court has determined the costs of the case and ordered the payment of those costs
